translation: Nrm th khoshgvar hvahn hund qsm yim pyotthus pytth pkan chih.
Pth ṭvfạnụ̄th tyz hvahn hund qsm yim shdydczahttv sintụ̄ pkan chih.
Byyhi tihund qsm yim aobrn chih pth ṭrfs kun phhlavan.
Pth tihund qsm yim (timn) phasvith chih byon byon kran.
Pth tihund qsm yim nṣyḥt aann vạlụ̄ chih.
Ḥjt tmam krnh mokhh ya khvcznavnh khạṭr.
Be shk yus (qyamtuk) vʿdh tohyhi sintụ̄ krnh chuh yivan suh rvzi ẓrvr pvur spdith.
Pth yylhi tarkn hund gash yiyhi khtm krnh.
Th yylhi āsmạnụ̄ kaynats mnz gdụ̄ gczhn.
Th yylhi pharr yin (ryzh ryzh krith) vuddnavnh.
Th yylhi pyghmbryin mqrrvqts pytth (pnnyn pnnyn aumtn pytth gvạhy khạṭr) jmʿ krnh.
Kmhi sanadoh khạṭr chuh (yimn sarine kthn hund) vqt āmut mqrr krnh.
Fạṣlh kh doh khạṭr.
Th tohyhi kmụ̄ vonnv zi fạṣluk doh kya chuh.
Tamhi doh chhe ankar krn valyn khạṭr khrạby (th tbạhy).
Kya aashi ạsụ̄ na brvuntthim (ankar krn vạlụ̄) lukh hlak krụ̄ mtụ̄.
Pth chihkh asụ̄ ptim lukh thi (hlakts mnz) timn pth pknavan.
Asụ̄ chih mjrmn sintụ̄ aamy āyuk (mʿāmlh) kran.
Tamhi doh chhe ankar krn valyn khạṭrbrr khrạby.
Kya aashi krivna tohụ̄ vsụ̄ payhi āb (kh akhi qṭrh) nishhi pạd.
Pth thvv suh mḥfvẓ jayhi (yʿny majhi hnzi bchhi danhi) mnz.
(vqt kis) akis mqrr krnh āmtis andazs tam.
Pth krụ̄ aashi (nṭfh pytthh zyns tam kyn tmam mrḥln khạṭr) vqtkụ̄ andazh mqrr, lhādha kithụ̄ zbrdst andazh mqrr krn vạlụ̄ chih (asụ̄).
Tamhi doh chhe ankar krn valyn khạṭr brrtbạhy.
Kya aashi bnạv na zmyn vttith aann vajinụ̄.
(yosh vttan chhe) zindn (thi) th mordn (thi).
Aashi thạvụ̄ aath pytth thdụ̄ th mẓbvṭ pharr byyhi chavnạvụ̄vaashi tohụ̄ (mytthyn nagn hndi dhryʿh) myvutth āb.
Tamhi doh āshi ankar krn valyn khạṭrbrr brbạdy.
(vonụ̄) pkiv tohụ̄ tath (ʿdhabs) kun yath tohụ̄ ankar ạsụ̄vu kran.
Tohụ̄ pkiv (jhnm khi dhhi sintụ̄ bnyamtis) tath shihlis kun yath te ḥṣh chih.
Yus nah chuh shhjar vvl shihul th nah chuh narchh grmy nishhi bchavan vvl.
Be shk chuh suh (jhnm) thdụ̄ mḥl (khankụ̄) hivụ̄ (brrụ̄brrụ̄) lmbkh th timbri tulan.
(yithi chuh basan) znth timh (timbri) lydri rngkụ̄ avuntt chih.
Tamhi doh chhe ankar krn valyn khạṭrbrr tbạhy.
Yhi chuh tiyuth doh zi tim hykn nh (atah mnz) kth thi krith.
Th nah yiyhi timn ajazt dinh zi tim krn ʿdhr pysh.
Tamhi doh chhe ankar krn valyn khạṭrbrr hlakt.
Yhi chuh fạṣluk doh (yath mnz) asụ̄ tohụ̄ th (sạry) brvuntthim lukh jmʿ krvkh.
Pth agr tohyhi nishhi kanhh (ʿdhab nishhi bchnuk) ḥylh (th dav) chuh tylhi chlạviv (suh) dav me pytth.
Tamhi doh chuh ankar krn valyn khạṭrsytthah afsvs.
Be shk āsn prhyzgar tthndd shyhlyn th nagn mnz (ʿạsh th raḥt san).
Byyhi phl th myvh yymich thi tim khvạhsh krn (āsn tihindi khạṭr mvjvd).
(timn yiyhi vannh,) tohụ̄ khyyiv chyyiv sytthah mzh san timn (nyk) ʿlmn hndi bdlh yim tohụ̄ kran rvzan ạsụ̄vu.
Be shk chih asụ̄ yithe pạtthụ̄ nykvkarn jza divan.
Tamhi doh chhe ankar krn valyn khạṭrbrr khrạby.
(ae ḥqs ankar krn valyv!) tohụ̄ khyyiv kynczhs kals byyhi tuliv fạydh, be shk chihv tohụ̄ mjrm.
Tamhi doh chhe ankar krn valyn khạṭrbrr khrạby.
Byyhi yylhi timn vannh chuh yivan zi tohụ̄ nymiv (Allah tʿālyā sndis drbars mnz) tylhi chihnh tim nyman.
Tamhi doh chhe ankar krn valyn khạṭrbrr tbạhy.
Pth kth klams pytth aann tim yymhi (qrān) pth aymanin?
